channel.title: Comments on: Petting And Me
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Hehe... Right... escape.
I should really write a post about Ace's behavior. It's very interesting how she evolved over time.
item.content:encoded:
Hehe… Right… escape.

I should really write a post about Ace’s behavior. It’s very interesting how she evolved over time.

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: I don't know man. Egotistical douche bag fits you as well. Ace should judge (and as I remebr she keeps trying to escape through the window).
item.content:encoded: I don’t know man. Egotistical douche bag fits you as well. Ace should judge (and as I remebr she keeps trying to escape through the window).
